message(STATUS "shlibs=${BUILD_SHARED_LIBS}")
message(STATUS "btype=${CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE}")
ExternalProject_Add(ZLIB
  PREFIX ZLIB
  URL "http://zlib.net/zlib-1.2.8.tar.gz"
  URL_MD5 44d667c142d7cda120332623eab69f40
  DOWNLOAD_DIR ${DOWNLOAD_LOCATION}
  CMAKE_CACHE_ARGS
  -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX:PATH=${INSTALL_DIR}/ZLIB
  -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE:STRING=Release
  -DBUILD_EXAMPLES:BOOL=OFF
  -DBUILD_SHARED_LIBS:BOOL=${BUILD_SHARED_LIBS})


set(ZLIB_INCLUDE_DIR "${INSTALL_DIR}/ZLIB/include" PARENT_SCOPE)
set(ZLIB_LIBRARY "${INSTALL_DIR}/ZLIB/lib/libz.so" PARENT_SCOPE)
